description: Gordon Ramsay is a British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality...
treating: Gordon Ramsay's signature dish is Beef Wellington, which is a filet of beef wrapped in puff pastry and served with mushroom duxelles and a red wine reduction...

instructions: Season and sear the beef
Wrap in puff pastry with mushroom duxelles
Bake until golden brown
Roast the scallops in butter
Puree the peas with bacon vinaigrette
Serve with the scallops

description: Ina Garten is an American author and host of the Food Network program Barefoot Contessa...
treating: Ina Garten is famous for her roasted chicken, which is seasoned with garlic, lemon, and thyme...

instructions: Season the chicken with garlic, lemon, and thyme
Roast in the oven until golden brown
Mix dry ingredients together
Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth
Bake in a greased cake pan for 30-35 minutes
